rules_text:
Chosen one [i]({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.)[/i]
When Sower of Wishes enters, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest back on top in any order.
rules_text2:
Flying
At the beginning of your first main phase, you may put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield, then draw a card for each land put onto the battlefield this way.
